text:
Dyanne Thorne (October 14, 1936 – January 28, 2020) was an American actress, stage performer and singer. She was known for her stage work in Las Vegas and as the lead actress in the "Ilsa" movie franchise of the 1970s. Her movie roles include "Ilsa, She Wolf of the SS", "Chesty Anderson, USN" and "Hellhole". Thorne was born in Greenwich, Connecticut.
Thorne died on January 28, 2020 in Las Vegas, Nevada from pancreatic cancer at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: Ilsa, She Wolf of the SS
